description: Even though Ink is 17, she is often mistaken as a grade-schooler, however she makes up for it with her high grades, especially in English. She meets Ark-kun who gives her the power to transform into the magical hero Pastel Ink; using a pink flip phone, changing into a duck-like outfit with blue hair. Using this new power she helps the people of her city while also using it to tutor Nao in English.
name: Nijihara Ink
